name: Dog Petting Simulator (Demo)
description:
Dog Petting Simulator is a first person indie game that emulates a highly realistic experience of the universal human dream: walking around a park all day and petting some playful pups.

The game's demo will include Eddie, the energetic and playful Parson Jack Russell, Momo, the sweet and sleepy Shiba Inu, and Ben, an older, yet just as loveable hound ready for your pets.

Dog Petting Simulator is developped by Studio Cacti, a small team of students at The Animation Workshop, Denmark. It began as a self study project with the intention to building a playable game using Unity and Maya, and to expand our knowledge on both programs, as well as the game development pipeline.

We hope to develop the game further after graduation to include many more dogs, and many more unlockables.
